---
title: "Get involved"
---

CSIDS welcomes [contributions](https://www.github.com/csids/) from the R and public health community. You can:

* Provide feedback on our R packages.
* Submit issues.
* Improve the documentation and use cases.
* Fix a bug by creating a pull request.

CSIDS looks forward to hearing from you!
